div.div: Saint John's Univ. vs. Augsburg College
at Minneapolis, Minn. | Edor Nelson Field

tr.td: St. John's wins toss, will receive, Augsburg defends east end.
Ryan Mestnik kickoff 50 yards to the SJU15, Evan Clark return 21 yards to the SJU36 (R.J. Cervenka; Michael Busch).
